message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me.  Could we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
